Articles.Content: Floor 3973 is sentient. And it is very understanding
Floor 3974: A museum of the nothingness. It's blank (I hope you would've guessed)

Floor 3975: this floor is also sentient but it is not understanding, it only believes what it wants despite evidence and against all evidence to the contrary.

150908012023

also new page!

Edited August 1, 2023 by AlamoVampire
Floor 3976: This is a floor group session support group for sentient floors, so they can discuss what it feels like to be walked all over all the time.

Floor 3977: this floor has the drinks and snacks for the floor below as well as motivational posters!

110908022023
Floor 3988: this floor has a museum of excrementsCODE and KSP2 !
Floor 3989: A leaking word filter.

Floor 3990: a bunch of hot dogs filled with various cheeses as well as buns and toppings but not mustard.

122208042023
Floor 3991: exactly like Floor 3990, but with Korean Corn Dogs instead of hot dogs. (Specifically Korean because they still have cheese and toppings.)
Floor 3993: An old arcade game called Kerbal Space Program (this name is unknown to you)

Floor 3994:

Chinese man eating rice

Floor 3995: an angry person who just wants his air conditioner to be working fearing its going to be 24 hours before it is.

182608042023
Floor 3996: a big ape, sitting on the air conditioner intake.

Floor 3997: im that ape and hoping my ac holds until the tech arrives! Fun floor this one lol

002608052023

Floor 3998: A terrace. If we estimate that the average floor height is 3-5 meters (there are some tall floors as well), then the floors after around 1000 should have been fully pressurised. Now we're at about 12000-20000 meters from the ground (lets say 16000), so you need a mask for this terrace

Floor 3999: There is a man waiting for you on this floor. He calls you Douglas and tries to convince you that none of this is real, that you are actually strapped into a special chair in a business called Rekall. He says that you went in there to get memories of having a holiday on Mars, but something went wrong. Now you are at risk of going mad. You almost believe him, until you see a bead of sweat trickle down his forehead. You run for the next floor.
Floor 4000: A map, showing all 3999 previous floors
Floor 4001: A caption: "Still one floor above."
Floor 4002: These guys:

Floor 4003: a very worn out chair

130808052023

Floor 4004:

Intel 4004 microprocessor encased in ice.
Floor 4005: Be careful! That thing... from the floor 4004... It's crawling to you!

Floor 4006: an emp device setting off an emp so powerful that it makes the merging of the universes 2 largest black holes (known or otherwise, even if unknown they still exist or did prior to this merger making a larger one yet) look as meek as a single one of these:

thus destroying that chip.

140908052023
Floor 4007: Having been disrupted by the previous floors EMP device, this floor just looks like an empty Star Trek holodeck. You are not sure how you will get up to the next floor.
